title: PGPD Searches For Missing Child
body:
UPDATE January 9th, 2018: Mr. Williams has been located in good condition.



 The Prince George’s County Police Department
is seeking the public’s assistance in searching for a missing child. He is
identified as 11-year-old Prince Williams Jr.

 

Williams Jr. was last seen in the 2200 block
of Houston Street in Suitland on January 8, 2018 at 4:00 pm.



 

Williams Jr. is described as an African
American male, 5’04” tall and 170 pounds.
He was last seen wearing a black coat, black pants with black / blue shoes.

 Anyone with information on his whereabouts is
asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s Regional
Investigation Division – Central Region at (301) 772-4911.
